attributes.action: Captain Tom Moore should be knighted for his enormous effort to help the NHS
attributes.additional_details: His enormous efforts in protecting the NHS in the war on Covid-19
attributes.background: To officially recognise Tom Moore by petitioning Buckingham Palace for a Knighthood or a Queen's Gallantry Medal

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
